itunes:title: Ask Us Anything + Beach Reads
title: Ask Us Anything + Beach Reads
description:
In Episode 53 of Book Talk, Etc. Tina and Renee answer YOUR questions!Â  They also share what they've been loving lately, their latest reads, shelf additions, and have book talk about beach reads

**If you enjoy our podcast, please consider supporting us on Patreon ! We have great bonus episodes including: Books we DNFed, Books We Disagreed On, What's in the Mailbag, & Second Year Spoiler Author Chat, plus fun Zoom events like Mood Reader Happy Hour and Book Talk Book Club, a private Facebook group & our BRAND NEW DISCORD where you can interact with other patrons & we just introduced reading partiesðŸŽ‰- all for just $5 a month!

Loving Lately
